scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Cotton Weaving Class Notebook from 1914-1915 belonged to Alec Atkinson, a student at Nelson Municipal Technical School. It contains his notes on how cotton weaving works, and begins with a table of contents. His notes on cotton weaving also include diagrams and drawings to describe the process of cotton weaving. The notebook also includes fabric samples weaved with different designs and textures.
